select.getAllDepartments: SELECT id_department as Id, name_department as nameDepartment , status as status, code as code , description as description FROM demo_ef.tbl_department where is_deleted = false ;
select.getDepartmentById: SELECT id_department as Id, name_department as nameDepartment , status as status, code as code , description as description FROM demo_ef.tbl_department where is_deleted = false and id_department = @Id ;

update.updateDepartment: UPDATE tbl_department SET name_department = @NameDepartment, status = @Status, code = @Code, description = @Description WHERE id_department = @Id AND is_deleted = 0
